飲恨.definition: to nurse a grievance; to harbor a grudge

飲恨吞聲.definition: to harbor a grudge with deep-seated hatred (idiom)

飲水思源.definition: lit. when you drink water, think of its source (idiom); gratitude for blessings and their well-spring; Don't forget where your happiness come from.; Be grateful for all your blessings!

飲水機.definition: water dispenser; water cooler; drinking fountain

飲流懷源.definition: lit. when you drink water, think of its source (idiom); gratitude for blessings and their well-spring; Don't forget where your happiness come from.; Be grateful for all your blessings!

飲茶.definition: to have tea and refreshments; to have dim sum lunch (Cantonese)

飲酒作樂.definition: drinking party; to go on a binge; to paint the town red

飲酒駕車.definition: drink and drive (moderately high blood alcohol concentration)

飲食.definition: eating and drinking; food and drink; diet

飲鴆止渴.definition: lit. drinking poison in the hope of quenching one's thirst (idiom); fig. a supposed remedy that only makes matters worse
